ae.title: Cloud Communication platform for all your ideas!

hello.description: Harness the power of omnichannel customer experience with HELLO, a robust and data-driven customer support platform to meet all your customer service needs.

campaign.description: It's not only about communicating, it's about communicating with your users smartly and efficiently.

segmento.title: Stop wondering, Start segmenting!
segmento.description: Run targeted campaigns, personalize marketing content, precise data access with customer segmentation.

otp.title: 2 Factor Authentication with SendOTP
otp.description: Enable mobile number verification, 2-factor login, voice backup call, OTP protected transactions with enhanced security and speed with our dedicated OTP service platform.

sms.title: Programmable SMS
sms.description: Send text messages globally with the powerful and robust Transactional SMS API.

email.title: Deliver a Consistent Experience with Transactional Email
email.description: With our developer friendly APIs, effortlessly deliver informational transactional email that has high open rates.

rcs.title: Redefine A2P messaging with RCS - Rich Communication Services
rcs.description: Interact via rich, branded, conversational RCS messaging.

voice.title: MSG91 Voice Call API Programmable yet personal
voice.description: Use Voice call API to build call flows anywhere in the world. Provide a personalized support in fixing complicated issues faster and easier.

whatsapp.title: One API for WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Modernize and scale your customer experience with robust Whatsapp API. Connect with your customer in the most simple, secure and reliable way.

oneapi.title: Integrate SMS, Email and Voice API in your software
oneapi.description: Build global customer engagement products with our developer-friendly communication APIs.

telegram.title: SMS API, Email API and Voice API Provider | MSG91
telegram.description: Streamline your communication with customers by intergrating SMS, Email and Voice API with MSG91 One API. Experience now.
